Harder Drive: Hard drives we didn't want or need

stories.text:
There are many different CI platforms; SourceHut CI, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions, Travis CI, CircleCI etc.

Each one of them has their own configuration setup with different ways to enable the CI, run commands and choose build environments.

Is there any way to have one git repository that does the same CI when it is pushed to all of the platforms?
stories.title: Ask HN: Cross-Platform CI?
As Climate Fears Mount, Some Are Relocating Within the US

stories.text:
What are you using for appointment booking and payments?

As a service provider, one to one or one to many virtual meetings and hopefully ability to just get paid easily integrated or easily added on? Paypal least preferred. Looking for credit and bank options APAC location.
stories.title: Ask HN: Appointment Booking and Payments

stories.text: Best is pretty general but essentially maximum utility, least amount of cost/complexity.  I want to securely track transactions and I'm wondering if something like what Git uses for versions is a logical option?  Using an nft seems like an expensive solution but are there unseen benefits of using a coin?  Does anyone know how Visa handles so many secure highly valuable transactions?
stories.title: Ask HN: What is the best way to track digital transactions?
